meanings.sent1: The store owner kept all the money in the cashboxes.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new cashbox to store my savings.
meanings.sent3: The cashboxes were chatting about the coins inside them.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a jumbled mess of cashboxes, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cashboxes gleamed under the store lights, tempting customers to spend.

meanings.sent1: The cashboxes in the office were all locked securely.
meanings.sent2: She counted the cashboxes one by one to make sure they were all there.
meanings.sent3: The cashboxes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with cashboxes, each representing a different project.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking inside the cashboxes was music to her ears.
